#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: group ID_GolfBag.

== Name ==

*[GID_GolfBag ID_GolfBag]*

  	

===  Documentation ===
        
			Identifying elements for a golf bag, used in foreign keys.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	  ((player.name, player.date-of-birth), player.golf-bag.name  )

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:date || player.date-of-birth ||   ||
|| xs:string || player.golf-bag.name ||   ||
|| xs:string || player.name ||   ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CREF_GolfBag REF_GolfBag]
----
    <xs:group name="ID_GolfBag">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:group ref="golfml:ID_Player"/>    <xs:element name="player.golf-bag.name" type="xs:string"/>  </xs:sequence></xs:group>
----
